name: little Foot doctor specialist free kids games
name_original: little Foot doctor specialist free kids games
description:
Everyone knows that medicine and surgery are bit of boring and weird topic , but we believe that our valuable visitors need an enjoyable, goal-oriented interactive experience to fully grasp the complex or unfamiliar concepts of surgery.

Kids let’s have a virtual surgery experience with Toe Nail Dr. It’s a fun way to make boys and girls aware of nail treatments. This is how you educate kids in a fun way. Feel comfortable to visit doctor now! Clean and beautiful feet are best so take care and remove rashes, cuts, pimples, dust and all the discomfort for toes.

Nail doctor kids foot game lets you experience the treatments to remove toe nail injuries, mud and other germs as well. Diagnose the little patients and cure them all. No salon can do it better than the nail doctor.
